page.title: 10Grinhams Coal Merchants
page.content: Grinham coal comes from{Wales.} It comes in three times a week and is delivered to their depot. They mainly deliver it to country houses. It's normally used for{domestic purposes and is delivered all over the area. They have plenty of competition with other dealers and their nearest competitor is P.D.Fuels. They have four people as staff, three permanent and one part time. They have two lorries of their own and they are delivering all week. The business has been there{80 yrs,}but they have only had it for 15 yrs. There is an office in{Sparrows Green, {Wadhurst,}because it is more convenient for them. The depot at is unmanned at Bells Yew Green. It is conveniently close to Frant Station.
